title: Wangzhe Da Shixiong
synopsis:
After Jiang Beiran came to Xuanlong Continent, he experienced the ups and downs of human relationships, and gradually figured out the rules of survival in this world, and was later accepted as a disciple of Guixin Sect. In the sect, he appears to be a low-key disciple who loves Go, but in fact he is proficient in chess, calligraphy, and painting, and is capable of literary and martial arts. He secretly helped the sect discover and train a group of outstanding disciples, and started the path of cultivating immortality in a low-key way...

(Source: Tencent, translated)
